info.title: Conference Room Connector
info.description: The Conference Room Connector (CRC) APIs allow developers to interface with [CRC](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/conference-room-connector/) features programmatically.

get.description:
Retrieves details of the managed Cisco or Polycom rooms account profile settings. To get information on an individual room profile, use the Get managed room profile API.

**Prerequisites**
* The Zoom account must have a CRC subscription

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `crc_account:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `crc:read:rooms_account_settings:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

get.description:
Returns the Enhanced API Connectors for Cisco or Polycom Rooms.

**Prerequisites**:
* The Zoom account must have a CRC subscription.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `apiconnector:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `crc:read:list_apiconnectors:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`   List API Connectors returned.

total_records.description: The total number of records returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token paginates through a large set of results. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.  Constraints: Max 300 Default: 30

api_connectors.description: The information about the API connectors.

id.description: The ID of the Enhanced API Connector.

description.description: The description of the Enhanced API Connector.

status.description: The status of the Enhanced API Connector.

networks.description: The private IPv4 networks that the API connector manages. To enter them use the slash notation.  Use a comma (,) to separate multiple networks.

enable_automatic_update.description: When enabled, the Enhanced API Connector will automatically update to new software versions.

version.description: The current version of software used by this Enhanced API Connector.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Creates an Enhanced API Connector.

**Prerequisites**:
* The Zoom account must have a CRC subscription.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `apiconnector:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `crc:write:apiconnector:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

description.description: The description of the Enhanced API Connector.

networks.description: The private IPv4 networks that the API connector manages. Use the slash notation to enter them.  Use a comma (,) to separate multiple networks.

log_level.description: The Enhanced API Connector logging level. Valid values: [OFF | ERROR | WARN | INFO | DEBUG].

enable_automatic_update.description: When enabled, the Enhanced API Connector will automatically update to a new software version.

201.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `201`  API Connector created successfully.

**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `60071011`

**Error Code:** `60071007`

**Error Code:** `60067099`

get.description:
Returns the details of an enhanced API connector.

**Prerequisites**:
* The Zoom account must have a CRC subscription.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `apiconnector:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `crc:read:apiconnector:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`   An API connector returned.

status.description: The status of the enhanced API connector. Valid values are `offline` or `online`.

networks.description: The private IPv4 networks that the API connector manages. Use slash notation to enter them. Separate multiple networks with commas (,).

log_level.description: The enhanced API connector logging level. Valid values are `OFF`, `ERROR`, `WARN`, `INFO`, or `DEBUG`.

managed_rooms.description: The IDs of Cisco or Polycom rooms that are directly and manually assigned to this enhanced API connector.

items.description: The ID of Cisco or Polycom rooms.

enable_automatic_update.description: When enabled, the enhanced API connector will automatically update to new software versions.

version.description: The current version of software used by this enhanced API connector.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `60071008`
Connector does not exist.

**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).
